name: Mira: The Legend of the Djinns

description:
Disclaimer :
This demo was made specially for the PIXEL GAME MAKER MV DEVELOPMENT CHALLENGE 2020.
If you like the game please feel free to : RATE IT HERE !
and make sure to comment or criticize, also report any bugs or issues you had while playing.


Introduction :
Mira : The Legend of the Djinns, is a 2D Sideview Adventure game, (between a Metroidvania  genre and a classic platformer), where you play as Eir with Mira as your guide and companion in combat.

Background Story :
Eir is a Gnawi, a bard who sings about spiritual beings and intends to be the savior of the kingdom from evil..but alas, he has no magic and all he can do is hunt old relics for a little bit of gold to survive, until he meets Mira, a powerful Djinn, at this points Eir's journey to become a real Gnawi starts.How to install :

1 - Download the demo. (it's free)

2 - Extract the RAR file.
3 - Look for this icon double click it. and the game will be lanched.

PS : If you get any drop FPS at the begining of the game just make sure you'r running the game with your Main Graphic Card.
Right click the Player.exe and open it with your main GPU.

4 - Enjoy the game ! ( you can use Keyboard or Xbox Controllers)

- Important : We are aware about a few bugs that occured while playtesting this version of the game, since the current available version is for the contest we are not allowed to update it, but we will make a new link for a new version ASAP to give you more content, better experience, and better quality of gameplay.
Stay tuned for more soon.
